recipe.title: Cucumber Yum Yum Cocktail
instructions: Using muddler or handle of wooden spoon, mash 10 cucumber slices and 8 raspberries in cocktail shaker. Add gin, honey, aquavit, and lime juice. Shake vigorously 20 times. Fill 2 old-fashioned glasses with crushed ice. Strain cucumber mixture into glasses, dividing equally. Garnish each drink with 1 cucumber slice and 1 raspberry and serve. Adapted from
* A Scandinavian liqueur flavored with caraway seeds; available at specialty foods stores and some liquor stores.
